  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,434) size 800x166

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x150
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 389x41
        text run at (0,0) width 389: "This is the first line of text."
